name: Atom Track
description:
Atom Track is a fast-paced 3D racing game that offers a thrilling and intense experience for single players. The game is set in a modern time where players take control of high-speed vehicles and race against the clock on challenging circuit tracks. With its racing theme, Racing game provides players with a truly immersive gaming experience.

As players race through the tracks, they will face tight turns, high-speed straights, and daring jumps that require quick reflexes and precise control. The game is designed to be fast-paced, with players constantly battling against the clock to set the best time possible. With its challenging gameplay, Atom Track  is sure to keep players engaged and on the edge of their seat.

Control - Keyboard
  • 'A' and 'D' - Movement
  • 'W' Key - Accelerate (Hold)
  • 'S' Key  - Brake 
  • Escape - Pause
Credits
  • Sean - Supervisor
  • Jonathan Vancent Kristanto - Team Manager, Game Designer, and Game Programmer
  • Dimas Idham Nugraha - Game Designer and Sound Engineer
  • Kevin Brivio - Game Programmer
  • Firman Djibran Neo Fortuna - 3D Artist
  • Dennis LeeRoy Teguh - 3D Artist
  • Devan Crystal Pratama - 3D Artist

If you like Racing game, please considering supporting our work!
